page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: The main farming type is Arable. The crops include wheat and barley. Recently there has been an increase in the amount of oil seed rape grown. This is now an important crop in the area. The cereals grown are used for animal feed. DAIRY FARMING There are a few dairy farms, but these have been reduced because of the E.E.C. regulations on milk quotas. The main cattle reared for milking are Fresians. OTHER TYPES OF FARMING Some farms keep sheep and some pigs although the latter are not as widely kept as other areas of Holderness.Potatoes are a widely grown crop.
